header_text: You have been called in for a performance review with your boss. Overall, you do good work, but you know your boss has noticed some errors recently. As you prepare for the review, you think that your meeting will probably focus on your successes.

elements.name: You have been called in for a performance review with your boss. Overall, you do good work, but you know your boss has noticed some errors recently. As you prepare for the review, you think that your meeting will probably focus on your successes._Work/Career Development_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
buttons: Your mistakes have been serious and unacceptable.
Most of your work has been of very high quality.
elements.correct_value: Most of your work has been of very high quality.
